description: Squala is one of Neon Nostrade`s bodyguards. During the job interview for new hires, he was one of the two moles planted alongside the applicants in order to test their strength. Although Squala has been one of Neon`s bodyguards for many years, he does not have a Hunters License. He is also in a romantic relationship with Eliza, one of Neon`s female attendants. Squala is later beheaded by Nobunaga. His nen ability gives him the capacity of manipulating dogs, being able to communicate with them through whistles and give them complex orders, such as guarding or spying.
name: Squala
